TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed WebPartExportMode extends System.Enum

summary.span: 指定匯出 控制項的全部、一些屬性，或全部都不匯出。

span.span: Specifies whether all, some, or none of a control's properties can be exported.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值，以從列舉值可以套用至屬性來指定可以匯出 Web 組件控制項中的哪些屬性。A value from the enumerator can be applied to the property to specify which properties from a Web Parts control can be exported. 根據預設的屬性無法匯出控制項和控制項的屬性設定為 None。By default, the properties of a control cannot be exported and the control's property is set to None. 若要啟用匯出控制項的所有屬性，設定所有的值。To enable exporting all properties for the control, set the value to All. 若要匯出某些屬性，同時防止屬性包含機密資料的匯出，您將屬性值設 NonSensitiveData。To export only certain properties while preventing the export of properties that contain sensitive data, you set the property value to NonSensitiveData. 屬性可以標示為機密透過屬性。A property can be marked as sensitive through the attribute. > [!NOTE] > 若要啟用 Web 應用程式包含 Web 組件控制項，在您的應用程式的 Web.config 檔案中的匯出功能，您必須將屬性新增至``內的項目``區段中的，如下列標記所示。To enable the export feature for a Web application that includes Web Parts controls, in the Web.config file for your application, you must add an attribute to the `` element within the `` section, as in the following markup. > > `` > > `` ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範使用屬性。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property. 請注意，針對匯出程式碼範例正常運作，您也必須更新 Web.config 檔案中 < 備註 > 一節所示。Note that for the export code example to work, you must also update your Web.config file as indicated in the Remarks section. 此範例中的第一個部分包含名為控制項的程式碼`TextDisplayWebPart`。The first part of this example contains the code for a control named `TextDisplayWebPart`. 此控制項是自訂控制項的範例 > 一節中找到的相同類別的概觀，不同之處在於它會新增`Personalizable`屬性設定為`TextDisplayWebPart.ContentText`屬性，因此可以匯出的屬性。This control is the same as the custom control that is found in the Example section of the class overview, except that it adds a `Personalizable` attribute to the `TextDisplayWebPart.ContentText` property so the property can be exported. 請注意，屬性宣告包含值`true`針對`isSensitive`參數，這表示此屬性會標示為機密資料將匯出之用。Note that the attribute declaration includes a value of `true` for the `isSensitive` parameter, meaning that the property is marked as sensitive data for export purposes. 若要執行程式碼範例，您必須編譯這個原始程式碼。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 您可以明確編譯它，然後將產生的組件放在您的網站的 Bin 資料夾或全域組件快取。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者，您可以將原始程式碼放在您網站的 App_Code 資料夾中，這樣就會在執行階段進行動態編譯。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 此程式碼範例假設您的原始程式碼編譯為組件、 將它放在您的 Web 應用程式的 Bin 子資料夾和參考組件`Register`在網頁中的指示詞。This code example assumes that you compile the source code into an assembly, place it in a Bin subfolder of your Web application, and reference the assembly with a `Register` directive in your Web page. 如需示範這兩種編譯方法的逐步解說，請參閱 < [ 逐步解說： 開發和使用自訂 Web 伺服器控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates both methods of compiling, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPart_ExportMode#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPart_ExportMode/CS/textdisplaywebpart.cs#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPart_ExportMode#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPart_ExportMode/VB/textdisplaywebpart.vb#2)] 此範例的第二個部分示範如何參考`TextDisplayWebPart`ASP.NET 網頁中的控制項。The second part of the example shows how to reference the `TextDisplayWebPart` control in an ASP.NET Web page. 請注意，在宣告式標記中，屬性值會設定所有項目，這表示會匯出甚至與敏感值的屬性。Note that in the declarative markup, the property value is set to All, meaning that even properties with sensitive values will be exported. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPart_ExportMode#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPart_ExportMode/CS/exportmodecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPart_ExportMode#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPart_ExportMode/VB/exportmodevb.aspx#1)] 載入網頁瀏覽器，並在動詞命令功能表上控制項、 按 [匯出] 動作，並遵循指示，匯出包含控制項的狀態和屬性資料的說明檔案。Load the Web page in a browser, and on the verbs menu of the control, click the export verb and follow the instructions to export a description file containing the control's state and property data.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartExportMode All = int32(1)

summary.span: Web 組件控制項的所有屬性都可以匯出。

span.span: All of a Web Parts control's properties can be exported.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartExportMode None = int32(0)

summary.span: Web 組件控制項的任何屬性都不可匯出。

span.span: None of a Web Parts control's properties can be exported.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartExportMode NonSensitiveData = int32(2)

summary.span: 只有定義為非敏感性之 Web 組件控制項的屬性才能匯出。

span.span: Only properties of a Web Parts control that have been defined as non-sensitive can be exported.
